title: 2025 BIGGEST AGRICULTURE DRONE TRAILER | nuWay AG

tasks.task: Assemble and operate an agricultural drone trailer.
subtasks: Weld a flight deck on a 22-foot trailer.
Install charge boxes and cooling stations for DJI T40 drones.
Route power cables to the top deck for charging controllers.
Equip the twin 160cc Honda GX engines for pumping chemicals.
Install a 175-gallon induction tank for mixing chemicals.
Fabricate a welded, Amish-built flight deck for strength and durability.
Design a top deck with charging infrastructure, including power outlets and hose rails.
Integrate a one-piece floor for movement efficiency.
